dialogue.name: EIRIKUR
dialogue.text: Tradeswomanman, eh? You've that look about you. Interested in putting those skills of yours to use undertaking a leve or two?

dialogue.name: EIRIKUR
dialogue.text: It's all above board─all handled under the auspices of the Crystal Exarch, worry not. We process and dole out a mountain of leves every day. Register with us and you can peruse the open ones at your leisure.

dialogue.name: EIRIKUR
dialogue.text: You'll be compensated too, in case you were afraid we were running some sort of charity. So─shall I put your name down in the ledger?

dialogue.name: EIRIKUR
dialogue.text: Right, then! Forename Surname, was it? Let me just finish filling out this remaining bit of paperwork, and then you'll be all set!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may now undertake Crystarium leves by speaking with Eirikur.

dialogue.name: EIRIKUR
dialogue.text: You dabble in trades? Could've fooled me. Are you sure?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 70 or above.
